channel.title: Running a server who do i do it

item.title: Running a server who do i do it
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

ok well go into your source folder and click run server and the black box will appear and you will keep that running, then your going to need hamachi so go to www.hamachi.cc and download it and make a new network and tell people the name and pass for it ,and they join it and use the ip beside your name to join by running moparscape and click file new server and pasting that ip in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Running a server who do i do it
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

Go To Dodian Downloads And Download Any Source There. Then Open It Up And Go To Your Compiler. Right Click It And Select Edit. Then Highlight It All And Delete It. Then Paste This Into It -

@Echo Off Title My Compiler Color 0F @Echo Compiling .. "C:\Program Files\Java\Jre1.5.0_09\Bin\Java.Exe" server Pause

Then Save It And Close, Then Run The Compiler And Open Up Your Internet, Then Go To MoparScape And Put Any UserName And Any PassWord Then Delete The 127.0.0.1 And Click Login.
If This Doesn’t Work It’s Because You Don’t Have The Jdk And Jre Kit. To Download It Click Here [b]And Download Jdk And Jre Version 5.0 Update 9.

If You Gather Any Errors Please Private Message Me ![/b]

Read full topic
